title: Baseball Codes: Beanballs, Sign Stealing, and Bench-Clearing Brawls: The Unwritten Rules of America's Pastime, The
description:
Everyone knows that baseball is a game of intricate regulations, but it turns out to be even more complicated than we realize. What truly governs the Major League game is a set of unwritten rules, some of which are openly discussed (don’t steal a base with a big lead late in the game), and some of which only a minority of players are even aware of (don’t cross between the catcher and the pitcher on the way to the batter’s box). In The Baseball Codes, old-timers and all-time greats share their insights into the game’s most hallowed—and least known—traditions. For the learned and the casual baseball fan alike, the result is illuminating and thoroughly entertaining.
 
At the heart of this book are incredible and often hilarious stories involving national heroes (like Mickey Mantle and Willie Mays) and notorious headhunters (like Bob Gibson and Don Drysdale) in a century-long series of confrontations over respect, honor, and the soul of the game. With The Baseball Codes, we see for the first time the game as it’s actually played, through the eyes of the players on the field.
 
With rollicking stories from the past and new perspectives on baseball’s informal rulebook, The Baseball Codes is a must for every fan.

title: Prescription for Wealth: Why You Should And Can Be Rich
description: An introduction to the Infinite Banking Concept and how to Become your Own Banker.  Learn to setup and use your own Self-Financing System.

title: Your Economic Destiny: Golden Rules of Financial Freedom the "experts" hope you will never understand or follow
description: Just as you have a spiritual destiny (a specific purpose to fulfill during your lifetime)... You have an Economic Destiny! Just as you would set a path to achieve any other dreams and goals in your life, there's a specific path to lead you to your financial destiny. Your victories and milestones won't just happen, but they'll be the result of many parts working together toward a clear vision. Your financial transformation can begin TODAY! There are simple, time-tested keys to help you defeat financial frustrations and dependence-steps to achieve your Economic Destiny. Despite your present financial status or what you may think about yourself, you have the potential for greatness-in your finances and every other area of life. But in order to achieve your spiritual or Economic Destiny, your mind needs to be renewed. Just as an Olympic athlete trains and prepares for a gold medal, you must lay a new foundation for victory in your life. Your ultimate success doesn't have to be left to chance! There are clear paths set before you...and your renewed mind will play a key role in steering you toward your true economic birthright. This book was written to expose the lies you've believed and reveal the truth about Your Economic Destiny! It's time for a new beginning. You need a clean slate, and this means forgetting what you think you know about yourself, about life, and about finances. As Will Rodgers famously said, "It's not what you know that hurts you, it's what you think you know, that just ain't so." Your new foundation for success must be laid on the rock-solid foundation of TRUTH-and this frequency is quite the opposite of popular opinion and the things you been taught by the "experts." Instead of just hoping your finances will someday, somehow, work themselves out in the end, you can follow a simple, step-by-step approach that provides guaranteed victory: Your Economic Destiny!

title: Head First Android Development: A Brain-Friendly Guide
description:
What will you learn from this book?

If you have an idea for a killer Android app, this book will help you build your first working application in a jiffy. You ll learn hands-on how to structure your app, design interfaces, create a database, make your app work on various smartphones and tablets, and much more. It s like having an experienced Android developer sitting right next to you! All you need is some Java know-how to get started.

Why does this book look so different?

Based on the latest research in cognitive science and learning theory, "Head First Android Development" uses a visually rich format to engage your mind, rather than a text-heavy approach that puts you to sleep. Why waste your time struggling with new concepts? This multi-sensory learning experience is designed for the way your brain really works."
